pages.text: This mothership can quickly take over the board if left unchecked, but can wreak aboslute havoc on your own fleet when destroyed.
Start firing rocks to the enemy every turn. Each rock's damage depends on the damage done to this ship: 1 if 0-2, 2 if 3-5 and 3 if 6-8. The ability will cost a lot of energy to activate.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: Only triggers if you used the active ability. When destroyed, the volcano violently erupts, targeting 10 of your own tiles at random and insta-killing anything there. Shields cannot block this and will also be destroyed.
